text:
Euclid Analytics | Generalist, Backend, Fullstack & Data Science Roles | San Francisco (SF), CA, ONSITE Only | euclidanalytics.com

We are seeking data scientists and generalist, backend and fullstack engineers with at least one year of industry experience.

Euclid Analytics we are a small, tight-knit team of data scientists and engineers focused on applying online machine learning and predictive modeling to physical location analytics.

You can email me at stephanie@euclidanalytics.com or apply online at euclidanalytics.com/about/careers/
